title: Praise the Lord, His Glories Show
author: Henry Francis Lyte

verses.text:
Praise the Lord, His glories show,
Alleluia!
Saints within His courts below,
Alleluia!
Angels round His throne above,
Alleluia!
All that see and share His love.
Alleluia!

Earth to heaven exalt the strain,
Alleluia!
All creation join to praise
Alleluia!
Praise the God of truth and grace,
Alleluia!
Justice, mercy, love, proclaim.
Alleluia!

Praise the Lord, His mercies trace,
Alleluia!
Praise His providence and grace,
Alleluia!
All that He for man has done,
Alleluia!
All He sends us through His Son.
Alleluia!
